main event: A civilian witness in Goshen, New York observed a bright, metallic, saucer-shaped object that was oscillating and varying in brightness on September 27, 1965.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 100-150 feet in diameter and disappeared rapidly to the east.
The witness had a previous UFO sighting and was described as being 'excited' about this one.
The witness's credibility was regarded as 'poor' by the investigating officer.
The object had a row of steady red lights on the circumference and a bright white light that eliminated under the ship.
The object made a low whispering whistle sound.
